mapper.select: SELECT USERIDX, TO_CHAR(USERNAME) AS USERNAME, USERID, TO_CHAR(USERPW) AS USERPW, TO_CHAR(USERINDATE) AS USERINDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(USERUPDATE, '-')) AS USERUPDATE FROM ACCOUNT_USER WHERE USERID LIKE #{userid}
SELECT TO_CHAR(NAME) AS MENUNAME FROM MENU ORDER BY IDX

SELECT TO_CHAR(IDX) AS BOARDIDX, TO_CHAR(MENU) AS BOARDMENU, TO_CHAR(TITLE) AS BOARDTITLE, TO_CHAR(WRITER) AS BOARDWRITER, TO_CHAR(INDATE) AS BOARDINDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(BOARDUPDATE, '-')) AS BOARDUPDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(READCOUNT, '0')) AS READCOUNT FROM BOARD WHERE MENU LIKE #{menuname} ORDER BY IDX

SELECT TO_CHAR(IDX) AS BOARDIDX, TO_CHAR(MENU) AS BOARDMENU, TO_CHAR(TITLE) AS BOARDTITLE, TO_CHAR(WRITER) AS BOARDWRITER, TO_CHAR(INDATE) AS BOARDINDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(BOARDUPDATE, '-')) AS BOARDUPDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(READCOUNT, '0')) AS READCOUNT FROM BOARD
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND WRITER LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
ORDER BY IDX

SELECT TO_CHAR(IDX) AS BOARDIDX, TO_CHAR(MENU) AS BOARDMENU, TO_CHAR(TITLE) AS BOARDTITLE, TO_CHAR(WRITER) AS BOARDWRITER, CONTENT AS BOARDCONTENT, TO_CHAR(INDATE) AS BOARDINDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(BOARDUPDATE, '-')) AS BOARDUPDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(READCOUNT, '0')) AS READCOUNT FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = #{boardidx}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET READCOUNT = #{newcount} WHERE IDX = #{boardidx}
UPDATE BOARD SET MENU = #{boardmenu}, TITLE = #{boardtitle}, CONTENT = #{boardcontent}, BOARDUPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE IDX = #{boardidx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(MENU, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, INDATE) VALUES (#{boardmenu}, #{boardtitle}, #{boardwriter}, #{boardcontent}, SYSDATE)
